alert.note: Alert for Adams; Fayette; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 12:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN LEWIS, EASTERN ADAMS, FAYETTE, SOUTHWESTERN PICKAWAY, WESTERN PIKE, EASTERN HIGHLAND, WESTERN SCIOTO AND WESTERN ROSS COUNTIES THROUGH 115 PM... At 1243 PM, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Washington Court House to Cynthiana to Rome, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Chillicothe, Washington Court House, Greenfield, Peebles, Vanceburg, Jeffersonville, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, Bainbridge, New Holland, Rome, Pike Lake, Kincaid Springs, Cynthiana, North Folk Village, Staunton, Good Hope, Frankfort, Blue Creek and Clarksburg. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 68 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Fayette; Highland; Pickaway; Pike; Ross; Scioto
